title: Introducing: Wet Leather
body:
Photo by Thaddeus Ruzicka

You know the moment in a slightly cheesy 80s film where a major character spontaneously breaks into dance? Well NY outfit **Wet Leather** may well have written the perfect soundtrack for that – in the form of recent EP cut _IWMU_.

So there’s more than a touch of Duran Duran and even Huey Lewis to their sound, but they pull it off expertly, and manage to create something that sounds resoundingly current. Check out _IMWU_ and _Make It True_ below.
